methods.name: getContent
methods.comment: Execute an HTTP/HTTPS GET request and return the resulting HttpURLConnection.

params.name: httpRequestProperties
params.comment: optional HTTP request header values to be included (may be null)

params.name: allowRedirect
params.comment: allow site redirects to be handled if true

throws.comment: if an error occurs while executing request

return.comment: HttpURLConnection which contains information about the URL

methods.name: getFile
methods.comment: Download a file by executing an HTTP/HTTPS GET request.

params.name: httpRequestProperties
params.comment: optional HTTP request header values to be included (may be null)

params.name: allowRedirect
params.comment: allow site redirects to be handled if true

throws.comment: if an error occurs while executing request

return.comment: String representing the content-type of the file, or null if the information is not available
